original: Sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: sa ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na sa ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Anārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: anārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na anārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Sārammaṇañca anārammaṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: sa ārammaṇam ca anārammaṇam ca dhammam paṭicca na sa ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe tīṇi adhipatiyā pañca pe aññamaññe cha pe purejāte āsevane ekam pe avigate nava sabbattha vitthāro
